biography.summary: Christopher A. Coons is an American lawyer and politician who has served as the United States Senator from Delaware since 2010.
biography.education: Amherst College (BA) and Yale Law School (J.D.).
biography.career: Prior to joining the Senate, Coons served as New Castle County Executive from 2005 to 2009.

contact.office_address: 218 Russell Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

timeline.event: Elected as U.S. Senator from Delaware.
Began serving as the senior U.S. Senator from Delaware.
